      • dismissGroup

        @RequestMapping(value="/{groupName}/dismiss",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity dismissGroup(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                         com.funcxy.oj.controllers.GroupController.DismissVerification dismissVerification,
                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String groupName,
                                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        POST解散群组
        参数:
        dismissVerification - 解散群组的权限测试
        groupName - 组名
        httpSession - 请求会话
        返回:
        是否解散成功

      • searchGroup

        @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity searchGroup(@RequestParam(defaultValue="/*")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String groupName,
                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(defaultValue="/*")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String type,
                                                                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        GET搜索群组
        参数:
        groupName - 搜索的群组名
        type - 搜索的群组类型
        pageable - 搜索结果的分页参数
        返回:
        搜索结果
        另请参阅:
        GroupType, Pageable

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity alienate(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String groupName,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                     com.funcxy.oj.controllers.GroupController.InnerClassUser owner,
                                                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)

        返回:

                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,

      • sendPullRequest

        @RequestMapping(value="/{groupName}/pullReq",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity sendPullRequest(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String groupName,
                                                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                            BindingProblemLists bindingProblemLists,
                                                                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST发送Pull Request
        参数:
        groupName - 目标题单所在的组的组名
        bindingProblemLists - 绑定的源题单和目标题单对象
        session - 请求会话
        返回:
        PR是否发送成功
